body:
"Odd" referring to "not match the original intent", @BelfordZ?

The scope which we agreed to in the meeting was "Istanbul - 1884" with an implicit understanding that removing 1884 was removing the breaking gas-repricings.  When Wei came to do the implementation, he found that we had actually misspecified, because we had "thrown the baby out with the bathwater" in two ways - firstly with the SELFBALANCE opcode, and second in an interaction between two of the EIPs which assumed that 1884 was present.

Phoenix addresses those two mis-specifications.   All this detailed by Wei on his website.
